name: Argondevils Cursed Synthesizer
description:
Generate daft tones!
Guaranteed NEVER to be in tune!
Create a mesmerisng racket!
"Drag" the tone to make it sound even worse!
If this works i will add to the sound set, let me know if you enjoy it & it works ok.
This is a very casual project, based on the engine behind my Ambient Void software, Available on ITCH.IO
